summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 11, S. A. Bell's Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue, Westlake Avenue and 7th Avenue, from Stewart Street to Virginia Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7538 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
